content: hi. how often is master broken? is it somehow safe to use it for production?

@ZulipLover it's rarely broken, and when it is, usually it's "broken" in the sense of there being a style linter error or something, not something functional. We deploy both to here and Zulip Cloud on a regular basis off of master.

We semi-publish the branch running on chat.zulip.org here: https://github.com/timabbott/zulip (gets force-pushed to regularly when we rebase the ~5 commits that we only want on chat.zulip.org and haven't merged to master, which generally are toggling feature flags for things we want to burn in for a while before running elsewhere)
